titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on a mixture of 2-Naphthalenesulfonic acid, 6-amino-5-[[2-[(cyclohexylmethylamino)sulfonyl]phenyl]azo]-4 -hydroxy-, monosodium salt, 2-Naphthalenesulfonic acid, 6-amino-5-[[4-chloro-2-(trifluoromethy)phenyl]azo]-4-hydroxy -, monosodium salt, and 2-Naphthalenesulfonic acid, 6-amino-4-hydroxy-5-[[2-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]azo]-, monosodium salt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/10/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2004, the duty on a specified chemical mixture.
